name: Talk Guards
_source: s;SoldierBlue;Damn, I thought joining the city guard would be a better gig.{w}{br}But patrols are so boring.{w} Nothing ever happens.
s;SoldierRed;Aye, but I'd rather be standing around all day than out there fighting for my life.
s;SoldierBlue;Suppose you're right.{w}{br}But you won't mind covering for me if I leave shift early?{w}{br}I'm meeting a lass this evening.
s;SoldierRed;Oh look at you.{w}{br}Find yourself a girl now you're too good for guard duty?
